title: How to Make Tofu and Vegetable Soup

steps.headline: Take a pint of chicken broth and put it in your pot.
Add the water to your pot.
Put fresh cleaned and fresh chopped carrots, cauliflower, and sliced super-thin chicken meat without bones.
Boil  the pot for about 20 minutes on high.
Turn off the oven or cooker.
Then add in thinly chopped leeks, 2 eggs (raw), and 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil.
Boil the soup on high and add some cubed tofu.
Mix and boil the soup and add tiny dried chopped onions.
Turn off the oven or cooker after 20 minutes.
Wait for it to cool and eat!

text: Take a pint of chicken broth and put it in your pot.  Add the water to your pot.  Put fresh cleaned and fresh chopped carrots, cauliflower, and sliced super-thin chicken meat without bones.  Boil  the pot for about 20 minutes on high.  Turn off the oven or cooker.  Then add in thinly chopped leeks, 2 eggs (raw), and 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil.  Boil the soup on high and add some cubed tofu.  Mix and boil the soup and add tiny dried chopped onions.  Add 2 teaspoons of fish sauce.  Turn off the oven or cooker after 20 minutes.  Wait for it to cool and eat!
